attributes.action: Once again guarentee ALL citizens access to a FREE dental service within a reasonable distance of there home without cost to the consumer as its included in your NI contribution along with access to other NHS services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should we have to pay twice for dental treatment. We pay our NI for the NHS then get stung as there are NO NHS dentists anymore.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
